itunes:title: #47: 3 Ways to Know It's Safe to Reconnect
title: #47: 3 Ways to Know It's Safe to Reconnect
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: If there's someone in your life you're wanting to reconnect with (or them with you), this episode is for you to determine if it is safe for you to restart that relationship. Listen to 3 things that you must have in place to make sure both your heart...
itunes:summary:
If there's someone in your life you're wanting to reconnect with (or them with you), this episode is for you to determine if it is safe for you to restart that relationship. Listen to 3 things that you must have in place to make sure both your heart and theirs is protected.
